page.title: 15CHANGE OF USE TREDIS
page.content: FOR MANY YEARS POLBATHIC WAS AN INDUSTRIAL AREA,DEPENDENT UPON ITS WIDE,NAVIGABLE TIDAL RIVER.BARGES CAME WITH COAL AND CORN WHICH WERE STORED IN OLIVER'S STORES (NOW FLATS). THE WHEELWRIGHT'S IS NOW A PRIVATE DWELLING,AS IS THE BAKE HOUSE AND THE MASON'S STORE.FOSTER'S STEAM ENGINEERING WORKS,WHERE AN EARLY STEAM CAR WAS BUILT,AND WHICH WAS ONE OF THE FIRST PLACES TO HAVE ELECTRICITY, WORKED OFF A WATER TURBINE,IS NOW A DISUSED GARAGE AND WORKSHOPS.THE INTESTINE DRESSER'S IS A STONE WORKS AND THE MILL IS FIVE FLATS AND A TEAROOMS.THE DOMINANT FACTORY, ONCE BRENTON'S FARM ENGINEERING,REMAINS, AND IS NOW REVITALISED AS A GALVANISING WORKS. OUTSIDE POLBATHIC, THE BLACKSMITH'S AT NARKURS HAS GONE,& TWO COUNTRY HOUSES HAVE BECOME HOTELS.
